Catherine is only mentioned as an ancestor of Zachary, while Patricia is only mentioned as a descendant of Christine. There is no path linking Catherine to Patricia through ancestors or descendants, and they do not share a common ancestor or descendant based on the information provided. Therefore, none of the specified relationships can be determined.
